name: Fish Pie
ingredients: white fish fillets, smoked fish fillets, shrimp, potatoes, butter, milk, flour, leeks, peas, parsley, salt, pepper
quantities: 1 lb white fish fillets, 1/2 lb smoked fish fillets, 1/2 lb shrimp, 4 large potatoes, 2 tbsp butter, 2 cups milk, 2 tbsp flour, 2 leeks, 1 cup peas, fresh parsley for garnish, salt and pepper to taste
recipe:
1. Cook and mash 4 large potatoes with 2 tbsp butter and 1/2 cup milk.
2. Poach 1 lb white fish fillets and 1/2 lb smoked fish fillets in 1.5 cups milk. Flake into chunks.
3. Saut√© 2 chopped leeks until softened.
4. Make a white sauce with 2 tbsp butter, 2 tbsp flour, and the poaching milk.
5. Combine fish, 1/2 lb shrimp, leeks, 1 cup peas, and parsley with the sauce.
6. Transfer to a baking dish, top with mashed potatoes, and bake until golden.
